name: @keneanung/nexus-package-manager
description: Package Manager for the Iron Realms Nexus 3 client
author: keneanung <keneanung@gmail.com>

scripts.webpack: npm test && webpack build --mode development --devtool eval-source-map
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.version: npm test && npm run lint && npm run format && git add -A src
scripts.nxs: npm run webpack && nexus-package-builder -v $(jq -r '.version' package.json) nxs/nexusPackageManager.yaml nxs/
scripts.nxsProd: npm run webpackProd && nexus-package-builder -v $(jq -r '.version' package.json) nxs/nexusPackageManager.yaml nxs/
